definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran

sentences.english: The Kashi River is one the Ili's three major tributaries.
sentences.chinese: 喀什河是伊犁河的三大支流之一。

sentences.english: It is the Tekes River, one of three major tributaries of the Ili River.
sentences.chinese: 特克斯河啊，這是伊犁河的三大支流之一。

sentences.english: Agroforestry is one of the important contents of the comprehensive development of Yili Valley area.
sentences.chinese: 混農林業是伊犁河谷地區綜合開發的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: The current of the Ili is the most powerful of all of Xinjiang's rivers.
sentences.chinese: 伊犁河是新疆水流量最豐沛的河流。

definition: Irtysh River, flowing from southwest Altai in Xinjiang through Kazakhstan and Siberia to the Arctic Ocean
Tekes River in southeast Kazakhstan and northwest China, a tributary of the Ili River 伊犁河[Yi1 li2 He2]
Ejin River in Alxa League 阿拉善盟[A1 la1 shan4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia
Argun River of Mongolia and Heilongjiang province, tributary of Heilongjiang River 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
Syr Darya, Central Asian river, flowing from Kyrgiz Republic through Kazakhstan to the Aral sea

pinyin: Gu3 er3 ban1 tong1 gu3 te4 Sha1 mo4
